347590.name: Heroes of Hellas 3: Athens
347590.description: Rebuild Athens from the ashes of its destruction and secure the help of the Heroes of Olympus as you battle an evil god!  Through addictive match three-gameplay and compelling city building interludes, you will gather gold, meet the needs of a ravaged population, and search for legendary lockets that will allow you to summon the gods and appeal to them for help.  Two years in the making, Heroes of Hellas 3 is both a spectacular epic and a highly accessible casual game.  Are you ready to meet the gods?
347590.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 荷兰语, 俄语, 波兰语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
